availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Theodore W. Bledsoe (Paris, Illinois, and Mason County, Kentucky, attorney and farmer)

body.p: Paris, Illinois, and Mason County, Kentucky, attorney and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Bledsoe. Attorney in Paris in 1860. Farmer in Mason County in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 1, p. 25.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Edgar County, Paris, p. 12.
Illinois Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1851-1900), Roll #1301880-1301882, Edgar County Marriages, p. unknown. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Minerva, District 4, p. 15.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Kenton County Marriages, p. 104.
